entry.dcterms:title: Chances of Survival For Enterprises in Hungary 2001
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E59: Chances of Survival For Enterprises in Hungary 2001. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Sági, Matild
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Ministry of Economics and Transportation
entry.dcterms:description: Survival chances of enterprises - economic participation, participation in the second economy, enterpreneurial acticity, discontinuing and restarting enterprises from the seventies up till now; exploring the enterpreneurial activities of parents
entry.dcterms:subject: economic systems and development
agriculture
business/industrial management and organisation
person
survey data
time-series

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
